de.awi.floenavigation.helperclasses

Class ActionBarActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • de.awi.floenavigation.helperclasses.ActionBarActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminPageActivity, AdminUserPwdActivity, ConfigurationActivity, ListViewActivity, LoginPage, MainActivity, RecoveryActivity, SetupActivity

    public class ActionBarActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    This Activity creates and maintains the icons on the ActionBar at the top of the screen. This activity does not run on its own rather maintains the ActionBar icons for its child classes/activities.

    This activity checks if the tablet is connected to the WiFi network of an AIS transponder, if the tablet has a GPS Fix and if the length the database table DatabaseHelper.stationListTable is greater than 2, then it turns their respective icons green (or the color specified by colorGreen) otherwise the icons will be red (or the color specified by colorRed). It also populates the MenuItems Change Lat/Lon format and About Us according to the parameters passed to it.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Default Activity.onCreate(Bundle). It registers a Runnable with the Handler statusHandler which runs at a regular interval specified by UPDATE_TIME and it checks the booleans locationStatus and packetStatus and changes the Action Bar icons for GPS and AIS Connectivity accrodingly.
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.app.Activity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState -

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu menu,
                                   int showExtraParams)
        Creates the Action Bar icons on top of the screen. This method is overloaded with onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu). This method shows the GPS icon, AIS Connectivity icon and the Grid Setup icon on Action Bar and depending on the value passed to it, the method will either show the Change Lat/Lon format or About Us menu item. menu item as well
        Parameters:
        showExtraParams - if this is 1 it will show the Change Lat/Long format Menu Item. If it 2 it will show the About Us Menu Item.

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu menu)
        Creates the Action Bar icons on top of the screen. This method is overloaded with onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu, int). This method shows the GPS icon, AIS Connectivity icon and the Grid Setup icon.
        Overrides:
        onCreateOptionsMenu in class android.app.Activity
        Parameters:
        menu -

      • onStart

        protected void onStart()
        Registers and implements the BroadcastReceivers for the AIS Connectivity and GPS location broadcasts; which are sent from NetworkMonitor and GPS_Service respectively. The GPS Broadcast receiver sets the value of locationStatus and gpsTime to the values from the GPS_Service. The AIS Connectivity broadcast receiver sets the boolean packetStatus.
        Overrides:
        onStart in class android.app.Activity
        See Also:
        Runnable, Handler, BroadcastReceiver

      • onStop

        protected void onStop()
        Called when the Activity is about to be destroyed. It unregisters the AIS and GPS BroadcastReceivers.
        Overrides:
        onStop in class android.app.Activity
